animeDescription: An OVA based on the work of Kawaguchi Kaiji consisting of nine independent stories, each animated by a different director. With Beatles music involved, somewhere.  (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Morimoto Kouji', ['Co-Director']], ['Hamasaki Hiroshi', ['Director', 'Animation Director', 'Character Design', 'Key Animation']], ['Mochizuki Tomomi', ['Director']], ['Hamatsu Mamoru', ['Director']]]
